title: Deployer duty: keep automatically generated logs (â‰¥6 months unless otherwise provided)

article_refs.quote: Deployers of high-risk AI systems shall keep the logs automatically generated by that high-risk AI system ... of at least six months ... unless provided otherwise ...

legal_consequence.verbatim: Deployers of high-risk AI systems shall keep the logs automatically generated by that high-risk AI system to the extent such logs are under their control, for a period appropriate to the intended purpose of the high-risk AI system, of at least six months, unless provided otherwise in applicable Union or national law, in particular in Union law on the protection of personal data.

items.label: Financial institutions deeming clause
items.text: Financial institutions maintain logs as part of documentation under relevant financial services law.

items.label: Penalty (Art. 99)
items.text: Obligation/requirement; fines up to EUR 15,000,000 or 3% turnover may apply.
